Steps to reproduce:
1. Open a standard CDA document
2. Apply a template on a node from the context menu
3. Select Convert to Shell, Convert to Sandbag or Remove Template from the context menu

traces.message: unable to find the actual entry point for the template org.eclipse.ohf.h3et.datatypes.simple.IISimple@1b9ec6c
